channel.title: UMKL News
channel.description: The latest news from the UMKL

item.title: Test matches are being conducted!
item.description: Test matches are planned in the upcoming week, more will follow in the upcoming month...

item.title: Cheep Cheep Updates
item.description: Some updates about the Cheep Cheep Discord app and upcoming test matches.

item.title: Join our Discord server!
item.description: All matches are organised through our Discord server. Please join it to take part in a match!

item.title: Welcome to the UMKL!
item.description: We are a Mario Kart 8 Deluxe championship featuring teams from universities across the UK!

item.title: Upcoming summer test matches!
item.description: More test matches between teams are being planned as exams finish and summer approaches.
